data.text: @schmutzie ah the joy of the "change of life" -- is it menopause or am I dying, a meditation.

@genevrael This is the stuff: https://t.co/xrCLnBhyse. I first used evening primrose oil in the 90s when I had really sore boobs all the time, and it worked, so I tried it for hot flashes, and it seemed to die them down for the most part.
@schmutzie ...what does it do? How do you use it?
@genevrael It's maddening. I just bought some evening primrose oil, because it's helped me in the past.
@schmutzie I am having this question every goldurned day.
@schmutzie Me too. And Florida has long and oddly timed allergy seasons (odd for the rest of the continent)
@thatwoman The allergies! I’m always sniffly and whatnot.
@Kellllektraaaa You can pretty much assume it’s one of the Omicron variants.
@schmutzie Is it my allergies or Covid? Always allergies but at least I can test at home
@schmutzie I've had a bad headcold all week after not having been sick in years, tested negative 4 times. today woke up unable to taste or smell anything. Still testing negative. Super frustrating.
